rows.label: qst006103_msg0001
rows.name: So this is the Dalnes Stone?

rows.label: qst006103_msg0002
rows.name:
Rex, is there something written
on it over there?

rows.label: qst006103_msg0003
rows.name: Allow me to examine the Stone.

rows.label: qst006103_msg0006
rows.name:
It lies upon a mysterious Divine Beast
that moves about freely,
never exposing itself to human eyes.

rows.label: qst006103_msg0007
rows.name:
But in this place, Rigideria sank in a
single night, together with its people...

rows.label: qst006103_msg0010
rows.name:
If the whole country sank beneath the
clouds, there's not much we can do...

rows.label: qst006103_msg0011
rows.name:
Hah. You are too quick to give up.
I will not allow our quest to end here!

rows.label: qst006103_msg0012
rows.name:
We know where this kingdom met
its end. We may be able to salvage
some manner of relic from it!

rows.label: qst006103_msg0013
rows.name:
You've got to be kidding me.
Just how long do you think this
place has been down there?

rows.label: qst006103_msg0014
rows.name:
Relics of a long-lost kingdom...
I like the sound of that!

rows.label: qst006103_msg0015
rows.name:
Oh, for the...
Now you've got Rex started too?!

rows.label: qst006103_msg0016
rows.name:
Come, my retainers.
Let us get to the bottom of this tale!
